title: "a critical error has occurred this process must be terminated."
body:
started getting this error yesterday, right when i was about to load into ranked for promos (of course it happens now.) 
ive gotten this once in a blue moon in the past, and usually just uninstalling a reinstalling fixed it. but not this time, ive tried reinstalling the game and still get the message. also ive tried deleting "config" and "logs" and turning off firewall, doesnt help either. does anyone know any other ways i can try to fix this?
